question: compulsory for a wife to have sexual intercourse with her husband on their wedding night, ie the day before her walima.
answer:
QUESTION
I wanted to know whether it is compulsory for a wife to have sexual intercourse with her husband on their wedding night, ie the day before her walima. My aunty told me thay my walima will not be halaal if I did not have sexual intercourse with my husband on the night before my walima. Please answer this question. I am really confused. Is there any evidence from Hadith / Quran that supports this view. Please answer this question.
ANSWER


Share:

Sexual intercourse is not necessary for the Walimah to be valid.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
